info.name: Software Task Manager API
info.description: Complete API collection for Software Task Manager with all endpoints, authentication, and examples.

request.description: Login and get access tokens. Rate limited to prevent brute force attacks.

response.name: Login

response.name: Refresh Token

request.description: Logout and revoke refresh token.

response.name: Logout
